p: Scratch-wound assay: Cells were seeded in a 35 mm glass-bottom dish and grown to confluence in normal cell culture conditions. A scratch was performed with a 200 µL pipette tip, with debris washed and cells further incubated in cell medium supplemented with 1/8000 sea-buckthorn oil for 24 h, in Nikon Biostation IM. Images were acquired with 20× Ph objective every 20 min, and data were analyzed with NIS-Elements BR (Nikon Tokyo, Japan).
